de.iabg.math
Interface Matrix

All Known Implementing Classes:
AbstractMatrix, DiagonalMatrix, MassMatrix, ModeConnectionMatrix, ModeCorrelationMatrix, ModeMatrix, NodeConnectionMatrix, NodeCorrelationMatrix, NodeMatrix, RectangularMatrix, SymmetricMatrix
public interface Matrix

This interface declares basic functionality that mathematical matrices should have. It allows for subclasses to have optimized storage schemes and algorithms. The common way to implement this class is to extend AbstractMatrix, which provides default implementation for most methods.

Version:
September 14, 2008
Author:
Adam C. Dick, BSE
See Also:
AbstractMatrix

setColumnCount

void setColumnCount(int nColumns)
Sets the number of columns to the specified amount. The data of all cells may be lost due to resizing of the matrix.

Parameters:
nColumns - the new number of columns
